title: Unix Vs. Ruby --  Simple Tasks

summary: Here are a few tools to help you identify what your linux computer is doing on the network.

title: Captain Haddock Insult Generator
summary: When I was a kid I loved Tintin comics and so a little while back I made a Captain Haddock insult generator using the various curses the Captain utters through out the series.

title: Benchmark inject() versus each_with_object()
